name: Ricetta: Moranino
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mora Meat.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Moranino
value.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

value.name: Ningguang
value.desc: La Tianquan delle Sette Stelle di Liyue. La sua ricchezza Ã¨ ineguagliabile in tutta Teyvat.

value.name: Moranino Qiankun
value.desc: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?

value.text: Obtained during Archon Quest Chapter I: Act I "Custodian of Clouds"
